website_summaries.verdict: The reviewers raved about the shoe's comfortable and work-appropriate build, professional style, quality materials, and true-to-size measurements. However, not all were enamored with the footwear as they were mainly concerned about its big dimensions. Overall, it was deemed a solid walking shoe by many.
pros: Most buyers marveled at the comfortable build of the Reebok Work N Cushion 3.0
Many purchasers adored its smart casual style, which went well with their work outfits
The construction of the footwear made it appropriate for long hours at work, based on plenty of reviews
Numerous consumers felt that the trainer was made from quality materials
The shoe fit as expected, according to a handful of users
The affordable price pleased some of the wearers
Several testers were impressed by its lightweight nature
cons: Multiple individuals complained that the footgear ran large
A few people were disappointed that the upper seams of the black variant turned white
A small number of critics disliked that the upper felt too stiff in the beginning and required a break-in period for it to be more flexible

customer_reviews.title: Ok to wear, except couple of things
customer_reviews.text: All good except couple of things: - ventilation isn't great - looks like some parts of side upper material are not leather, let's see if that becomes an issue - overall looks more like workers' shoes These are not major issues, otherwise these are really good Update: after a week or 2 noticed that some white stuff comes through the upper part. Clean it every day but it still appears. Take 2 stars out as the look is really bad. See photos
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Work with comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for my previous pair of work shoes and these Reeboks fit snugly. The memory foam in the soles really adds a lot of comfort to the shoes and considering that the health of our feet is important to our general health and well-being is a major plus. That and sneakers tend to be more comfortable than traditional working shoes in my experience. Also, with winter edging ever closer and that these as I've mentioned are 'snugly' will help keep me and several others warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart, but only the left shoe so far.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality for Reebok, I have at least 6 pairs of trainers, never a problem. The stitching on the side started coming away after a month, after 6 months the toe stitching has come away completely. For £41 that's unacceptable, for me anyway, I won't be buying anymore, it's only the left shoe so far, and my left foot is the smaller of my feet, so it's not like my big fat left foot is causing this. These are for work, I stand in them mostly, no football or jogging and yet they continue to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: GRD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, study shoe
customer_reviews.text: Solid, comfortable and reasonably smart for a work shoe; Still a little trainer like. I also get a little bit of the "white chalk" but it's barely noticeable, after all I haven't bought a formal shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable great fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes I brought my self a pair and then my husband I needed non slip for work these are perfect for my job we both went 1/2 size bigger purely as we both have wide feet perfect fit don’t slip no blisters no breaking in required will definitely buy again. Yes some of the stitching does go white but a bit of polish sorts it out
customer_reviews.author: sarah alderson

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two years, longer than most shoes I buy
customer_reviews.text: I spend my day on my feet at work and most shoes I've bought last 6-9 months with hard wearing soles. I bought these a second time because they are durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Rogan

customer_reviews.title: excellent all purpose work shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and a good fit. I walk 10+ miles per day, indoor and outdoor and these do the job. If they were also waterproof, they'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sims

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: I use this trainers for job, I like because the sole of the shoe has a lot of grip, which instead happened to me with other Reebok. I wear them for a many hours a day: they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ☆adri.g☆

customer_reviews.title: Might be better ordering the  .5
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality for money my husband usually takes a 9 but 9.5 perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: mrs patricia park

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for a few months and wear them regularly walking for up to 10km at a time and never had a problem. Good fit (size 11) and never had any of the blisters or chafing you sometimes get with new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: rt19561

customer_reviews.title: Slightly narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of shoes. Smart enough for the everyday office, cushioned enough for the daily commute. Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: PRHO

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have had Reebok for years and these should last me a nother few. Rubbe soles is a must and the shoe isn't to narrow, which is better for the foot especially if you spend a lot of time on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Sales

customer_reviews.title: you need to order a size smaller than your normal
customer_reviews.text: they look good can be polished sutible for older men and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lilian J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of work boots. Very comfortable and light. Non-slip soles. Just the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sim

customer_reviews.title: Great soe + Geat Price
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fitted perfectly. Very comfortable shoe at a very reasonable price. Just wayt I had been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ian47

customer_reviews.title: lovely shoe
customer_reviews.text: found these shoes to be brilliant for work lots of support wish id found them years ago brilliant for shop work
customer_reviews.author: mrs j

customer_reviews.title: All day shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for Work, on feet most of the day. Says these are excellent. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Split after only a few weeks. Very disappointing as the shoes were actually comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy even works if u work long hours on your feet. Totally recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for work! Didnt slip anymore. Fit perfect, used them for 10+ hs straight and nothing to complain about them -edit: lasted me 9 months of very intense use and bought them again !
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Aristegui Valduvi

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Wear them to work 5x a week and they still seem as if they will stand the test of time. Super confortable and durable!
customer_reviews.author: KK WILS

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased I got these .. they are so comfy for my feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved It.
customer_reviews.text: I love it... very comfortable, albeit not stylish. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sometimes I shop...

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Well made. The non-slip works well. Comfortable. All round good value.
customer_reviews.author: D M G Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: I spend alot of time on my feet.I would do alot of walking because of my work & would work long hours.Lovely comfy shoes & suit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: University king

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and breathable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son to wear to work and he has very smelly feet they have been excellent and even in hot weather his feet have stayed fresh and dry
customer_reviews.author: MRS CLAIRE HENNESSY

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The work based trainers are exactly as stated and are a perfect fit for my son . The trainers were well packaged and arrived on time via Prime A good buy
customer_reviews.author: T D IBBOTSON

customer_reviews.title: Good comfy work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really good durable shoes..take a battering and still look good..very long lasting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. Fits as expected. Great work shoes, with non slip sole.
customer_reviews.author: 7zero

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very well made and looks solid to last a long time. Everything I was looking for except the hard sole which causes me foot pain. Nothing to deter buyer for a hardy yet comfortable pair. I personally had to change it for a lighter shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JSS

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable trainers but rubbish leather uppers that crack and form holes after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, if standing for many hours. They look fairly discreet with work clothes and are reasonably well made. After using these shoes, the leather cracked after 6 months of wear. Over £40 for 6 months of reasonable wear and care for product is a complte con. I was expecting something more durabel for the amount of money and from a good brand. Reebok discontinued a couple of very durable, strong leather trainers in favour of these. Good sole, but rubbish cheap and thin leather upper.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: My partner already has a couple of pairs of these and finds them excellent. I bought men's ones as my feet are exceptionally wide, and the only way for ladies' ones to fit would be to get them a size too big, and then they slip. So a man's 6 is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A K Thornewell

customer_reviews.title: Overall comfort
customer_reviews.text: The main asset of the Reebok Trainers is the degree of comfort which I felt when wearing them, in house, for the first few days to get used to them. I use tem for normal walking around the town and find the shoes very comfortable on the pavements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a pair of these.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say. So comfy, non slip grip and your feet ache a lot less when wearing these for a long length of time.
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE

customer_reviews.title: Work footwear
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work and I'm on my feet between 7 and 12 hrs a day and they are so comfy
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I got this pair as "Prime wardrobe" and happy with that, because otherwise I'd refund it. Looks like any mass produced garbage you see in some rubbish selling store like "Sport direct". If you need working shoues "Regatta Men's Samaris Mid II High Rise Hiking Boots" is better option with alsomt the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Vasilijs

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: very nice shoes, good looking and good for everyday use, good material quality. Adequate to the price
customer_reviews.author: TeK Nik

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Work N Cushion 3.0 High Rise Hiking Boots
product_meta.description:
Long day of work or walk on the weekend? These Work N Cushion 3.0 excellently exceed both tests. The mesh lining offers breathability, while the non-slip sole ensures stability even in wet conditions and on slippery or irregular surfaces.
EVA midsole and internal Memory Tech LT insole for better cushioning and responsiveness
Ideal for: long-lasting comfort, cushioning, long days on foot
Anti-abrasion rubber outsole for greater grip on the ground
Blunted heel to promote the movements of the foot during the stride
Weight 343 g
Fit: low-cut design to promote freedom of movement and faster transitions
Materials: upper in leather and synthetic material with mesh lining for excellent protection and breathability
